sys_update_xml.payload: customc .test{ width:100%; } .span.t{ font-weight: 500; line-height: 18px; text-align: center; } .panel { box-shadow: 0 2px 10px 0 rgba(0, 0, 0, .1); border: none; margin-bottom: 30px; } .panel > .panel-heading { border: 0; background:white; } .clickable-tile { text-align:center; font-size: 11px; } .clickable-tile:hover { box-shadow: 0 3px 11px 0 rgba(0, 0, 0, .3); } sp_instancetrueflyout-menu-categoriesfalseFlyout Menu Categories[{"displayValue":"Category","name":"categories","section":"other","label":"categories","type":"reference","value":"sc_category","ed":{"reference":"sc_category"}}]falsefalsesp_widgetclaudia.cruz2019-09-26 23:15:1348fef803db0c8c10ca1da0da4b9619ad59Flyout Menu Categoriesa9ae348fdbc88c10ca1da0da4b961994a9ae348fdbc88c10ca1da0da4b961994sp_widget_48fef803db0c8c10ca1da0da4b9619adclaudia.cruz2019-09-30 19:27:36

sys_update_xml.name: sp_widget_0ae12244db94845087295275ca9619aa
sys_update_xml.payload: customc#floating_panel{ position: fixed; right: 0; top:250px; z-index:100 !important; > ul{ border-radius: $border-radius-small 0 0 $border-radius-small; overflow: hidden; margin: 0; padding: 0; list-style-type: none; width: 60px; -webkit-transition: width .5s; /* Safari */ transition: width .5s; border-color: #3f5153; > li{ margin: 0; padding: 0; > a{ background: #3B9D92; display: block; height: 60px; line-height: 30px; color: #fff; text-align: left; font-weight: normal; padding: 12px 0 12px 12px; position: relative; i.sn-icon{ margin-left: -5px; &:before { font-size: 3.6rem; } } span{ display: block; white-space: nowrap; position: absolute; left: 60px; top: 15px; font-size: 18px; } &:hover{ background: lighten(#4a5f61,10%); } &.itemSelected{ background: #FFFFFF; i{ -webkit-filter: brightness(0); filter: brightness(0); } span{ background: #FFFFFF !important; border-color: #293E40 !important; color: #293E40 !important; } img{ -webkit-filter: brightness(0); filter: brightness(0); } } } } } .servicePanel{ position: absolute; top:-100px; z-index:1071; } .panel{ position:absolute; right:0; /* min-width:440px; */ display:block; } .close-btn { width: 27px; position: absolute; right: 20px; z-index: 200; top:15px; } } .sn-icon-close:before{ font-weight: 700; font-size: 120%; } .panel{ min-width: 440px; } sp_instancetrueflyout-iconfalseFlyout Icon[{"displayValue":"Category","name":"categories","display_value_list":[],"section":"other","label":"categories","type":"glide_list","value":"sc_category","ed":{"reference":"sc_category"}}]falsefalsesp_widgetclaudia.cruz2019-09-30 09:01:330ae12244db94845087295275ca9619aa47Flyout Icona9ae348fdbc88c10ca1da0da4b961994a9ae348fdbc88c10ca1da0da4b961994sp_widget_0ae12244db94845087295275ca9619aaclaudia.cruz2019-09-30 19:22:11
